attributes.action: Don’t allow primary schools to regularly weigh their pupils
attributes.background: Primary schools are going to weigh their pupils regularly over fears of an obesity spike and I don’t think this should be allowed it could give children eating disorders body image issues and possibly even encourage bullying from other pupils these children & tragic consequences in future will occur

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586810
